title: How to Log Out of Viber on Android

steps.title: Open Viber on your Android.
steps.content: Open Viber on your Android. It’s the purple icon with a phone receiver icon. You’ll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . It’s at the top-left corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Exit.
steps.content: Tap Exit . It’s at the bottom of the menu. A confirmation message will appear.

steps.title: Tap OK.
steps.content: Tap OK . You are now signed out of Viber.
